review_title: Small community feel in a big city
job_title: Registered Nurse in New York, NY
pros: flexibility, good co-workers, really get involved in patient care. Got to help others.
cons: upper management could be more hands on, helpful. Sometimes staffing is low so everyone has a higher workload.Patients are sometimes rude.

review_title: The usual hustle and bustle of a high volume hospital in NYC
job_title: Customer Service in New York, NY
pros: The location is nice, right by the financial district, close to Chinatown, can take a walk down to the pier for lunch or when you just need a moment to relax.  The people working there are okay, everyone finds their own little niche, but most are helpful/friendly.
cons: The management is erratic, ime they only ever came down to see you when their was a problem.  They are cordial enough when you pass them in the hallways but its live and let live until someone messes up.
